business_definition: Program Communication Block (PCB) for PAUT database access, containing database control information and status fields
Database descriptor name identifying the IMS database being accessed
Hierarchical segment level in the database structure
Status code returned after database operation indicating success or error condition
Processing options defining allowed operations (Get, Insert, Replace, Delete) for the PCB
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
Name of the current database segment being processed
Length of the key feedback area (USAGE COMP)
Number of sensitive segments defined for this PCB (USAGE COMP)
Key feedback area containing concatenated key values from the database hierarchy
